channel.title: Noob needs help.. -.-
channel.description: What folder would I go to to change the ip on The lost universe base. It always starts on 0.0.0.0 and port 8080. Don't give me crap saying I didn't do any research I tried google. Thanks all.

item.title: Noob needs help.. -.-
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

you didn’t do any research, you didn’t even try google.
lol jk

if you have “bytesearcher” then you can search 0.0.0.0 and it will tell you where it is, including which line it is. Go into that place and change it to your server ip

Read full topic
